sentences.sentence: With the arrival of the crayfish, Miller says, "Stoneflies are gone - basically wiped off the face of the Earth."
sentences.translation: 米勒说，小龙虾的到来使得“石蝇消失了，基本上就是灭绝了。”

sentences.sentence: They also found that the water became well aerated and that populations of important food-chain insects such as mayflies, stoneflies and caddisflies grew.
sentences.translation: 他们也发现河水的通气性良好，重要的食物链昆虫像是蜉蝣、石蝇和石蛾的族群数都增加了。

sentences.sentence: At the end of that time, the team found higher populations of stoneflies, mayflies and caddis flies in the screened segments than in adjacent unscreened ones.
sentences.translation: 时间结束时，该研究小组发现在安置有滤网的河段中，石蝇，蜉蝣和毛翅蝇的数量远高于相邻的未安置滤网的河段。
